actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-140.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 4976, a bill to amend the Public Health Service Act, the Community Mental Health Centers Act, title V of the Social Security Act, and the program of assistance for home health services to authorize appropriations for fiscal year l978 for health services programs.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 4976 (Authorizations for health services programs).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 4976, a bill to amend the Public Health Service Act, the Community Mental Health Centers Act, title V of the Social Security Act, and the program of assistance for home health services to authorize appropriations for fiscal year l978 for health services programs.
